title: Upgrade libraries to use latest versions
body:
**Found so far: **
- [x]  jQuery
- [x] Bootstrap


Also: store them locally rather than use CDN copy.

title: Double check sources of images etc
body: Double check sources of all images / resources etc. to ensure they're appropriately licensed for use (if unsure/unverified, replace them).

title: Setup public Glassfish/Payara web server to deploy to
CI / CD Pipeline
body:
Setup continuous integration / deployment

e.g. run unit tests on every commit

e.g. deploy to "live" when creating a release

title: Integrate with other things -- e.g. sleep trackers
Categorise how time is spent
body:
e.g. label activities as "work" / "commute" / "self-care"

The app could then potentially give notifications e.g. "You seem to have spent very little time sleeping here - are you okay?"

title: Social login? 3rd party logins?
body: e.g. use google or facebook or twitter or github OAuth to enable login?

title: Think about "why" this is a cool project / how it is newsworthy etc
body:
How can we "sell" this / make it popular?

Who would benefit most from it?

title: Digital Health and Wellbeing
body: could be the focus of the project as it is the trend now , how to make people spend less time attached to screens idk throw some ideas

title: At end -- have video/gif demo or tutorial thing describing how it works
Integeration with google calendar
body: the idea is we could let the app/website work with the events already put into google calendar and these could be the time spent and automatically assign these to the users daily time

title: Decide back-end technology and how we can connect to the database from it and how the html web page can access data from it
Decide database technology / table layout etc
Graphical representation of weeks
body: add pie chars to see how each day is spent

title: Have "shared" time budgets
body:
e.g. between housemates / co-workers

to decide -- "roles"? e.g. owner vs editor vs logger?

title: Add a recurring "expense"
body:
Add "frequency" of an "expense" 

- E.g. 3hrs / week
- E.g. 1hr / day
- E.g. 1hr / fortnight
- E.g. 2hrs every second Thursday
- E.g. 1hr every 3rd Saturday

title: Add a time "expense" to the budget
Minimal - Have user accounts
body: Even if the user accounts have to be manually added to the database or are hard-coded into the app, this issue will be "complete" once there is *some* ability to switch between accounts (and each account having its own data/budget etc)
